result.purpose: Responsible for managing quests, user profiles, events, rewards, and shop services in a gaming context.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing services related to quests and user interactions into separate files for maintainability and scalability.

internal/services/quest-center/actions.g.purpose: Provides services for retrieving quest actions from a repository.

internal/services/quest-center/event.go.purpose: Provides services for managing events in a quest center, including caching and retrieval.

internal/services/quest-center/generics..purpose: Provides error handling utilities for the quest center services.

internal/services/quest-center/point_tra.purpose: Implements a service for tracking and creating point activities for users in a quest system.

internal/services/quest-center/pools.go.purpose: Provides services for managing quest pools in a gaming context.

internal/services/quest-center/profile.g.purpose: Defines a service for managing user profiles in a quest center application.

internal/services/quest-center/quest_hel.purpose: Provides helper functions for managing quests, including finding sponsors, counting players, and retrieving rewards.

internal/services/quest-center/quests.go.purpose: Defines services and data structures for managing quests in a quest center.

internal/services/quest-center/rewards.g.purpose: Provides services for managing quest rewards in a gaming application.

internal/services/quest-center/shop.go.purpose: This file implements the shop service for managing categories, tiers, and items in a quest center.

internal/services/quest-center/shop_help.purpose: Provides helper functions for managing shop-related operations, including caching and purchase validation.

internal/services/quest-center/shop_moni.purpose: Defines a structure for handling failed purchase completions in a shop monitoring service.

internal/services/quest-center/sponsor.g.purpose: Provides services for managing sponsors in the quest center.

internal/services/quest-center/user.go.purpose: Provides user management services for the quest center, including user creation and retrieval.

internal/services/quest-center/user_even.purpose: Provides services related to user events in the quest center, including premium user management.

internal/services/quest-center/user_ques.purpose: Provides services for managing user quests in a quest center system.
Handles user quest operations including verification and creation of user quests.

internal/services/quest-center/user_rewa.purpose: Manages the distribution of user rewards in the quest center service.
